name: IP_PEND_MED_REC
description: This table contains Inpatient order reconciliation information for pending orders.

columns.name: EVENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the event record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PEND_LINK_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the link type of a pended order, for example "AND" if the order is meant to be connected to another specific order.

columns.name: PEND_LINK_GROUP
columns.description: Stores the number of a group of pended orders. This does not link to anything.

columns.name: PEND_LINK_GROUP_POS
columns.description: Stores the number assigned to an order as part of its group.

columns.name: PEND_RES_INDI_CMNTS
columns.description: Stores the pended comment about indications when a medication is resumed at discharge.

columns.name: PEND_DC_NOTE
columns.description: Stores the pended note entered by an end user when they mark a medication to be discontinued.

columns.name: PEND_ORDER_REC_HOLD_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the pended hold or unhold action, if any, for the current line.

columns.name: PEND_HOLD_INFO_LINE_NUMBER
columns.description: The line number in the order record that contains additional hold information for this pended order reconciliation action, if applicable. The values in this column can be linked to the LINE column in the ORDER_HOLD_INFO table.
